attributes.title: the worst thing iâ€™ve ever downloaded
attributes.review: i downloaded this app hoping that it would clear my skin, but it turns out it does not! immediately after downloading this app confetti burst all over my room (which i will have to clean up) and a cardboard cutout of donald trump popped up and yelled at me telling me i was stupid and ugly! it then moved over to me and called me a b*tch and slapped me in the face! i cant believe i was fooled into downloading this app. never again!!!!!!!!

attributes.title: laggy
attributes.review: the app took a while to download and once i downloaded it, took about 6 tries before it would send a confirmation code to my number. it takes forever to load pages, and ended up using a lot of storage. it would keep making my phone crash, even if i went to other apps, which hadn't happened before. iâ€™ve never had a problem with my phone crashing or leaving apps until i got this app. i genuinely wanted to use the app to follow trumps election plan, but i will have to delete it so i can use my phone again, unless these problems are fixed.
